line: we are just here to say goodbye we are off to ohio
yep we are gonna meet the lady who could be carrying our baby
when you guys come back you are gonna have a baby
she is only a couple of months pregnant
she liked our application but who knows if she is gonna like us
come on she is gonna love you guys
uhm thank you but we are really trying not to get our hopes up
and a lot could still get in our way
i mean this girl could decide against adoption or she could like another couple better
what are you gonna name the baby
i can develop a condition in which i talk and talk and no one hears a word
what if this woman does pick you guys
so we are standing firm on the not getting our hopes up
you know i know that things could still go wrong but if they do not
if this works out we are gonna have a baby chandler a baby
oh my god it is gonna work
we are gonna make it work
gonna be a mummy and you are gonna be a daddy
oh screw it gonna be a daddy
gonna say someone gonna have s x with
do not you get any ideas ok
no not setting you up with any more of my friends
because you will date her once sleep with her and then forget she exists
oh name one friend of yours that i did that with
i know why i do not remember her huh
ok i may not have treated your friends well in the past but i have grown up a lot really
well believe it or not it is true
when joey and i were together he was wonderful
and for the one week that we went out he did not sleep with anybody else
and i promise you i will not forget this one
hey you guys i need some fashion advice
well it is a little low
i buy 30 fashion magazines a month
now i do not know who is running for president or who that
nato guy is but i do know that you have to get as far away as you can from that hat
i have this date tomorrow night and i have to look cool
well you know if you want fashion help rachel and i are going shopping tomorrow
you are more than welcome to come with us right
i mean i have to do something she kinda teased me about how i dress
i can see why nice shirt
you are wearing the same shirt
please make yourself comfortable and i will back in a moment with erica
may i have the human growing inside you
uh we are gonna be great
it is so so nice to meet you
thank you so much for agreeing to see us
so it is monica and chandler
i only know you as file 0w33815 d
that is what our friends call us
gosh you know you are just such an amazing couple
i do not know about that
i mean it is enough that you are a doctor
but on top of it you are married to a reverend
i do not think that is exactly
oh my friend sarah had a great time last night
so you are gonna call this one back
you know what your great friend did
we are out to dinner ok
we are getting along having a really nice time
i was thinking she was really cool
that’s why you won’t go out with her again
so she took some fries big deal
it’s not about a few fries
it’s about what the fries represent
i’m sorry i can’t believe i set you up with such a monster
i take a girl out she can order whatever she wants
just don’t order a garden salad and then eat my food
that’s a good way to lose some fingers
joey and my friend were out last night and having dinner and she reaches over and takes a few of his fries
you know about the plate thing
i mean just last week we were having breakfast and he had a couple of grapes on his plate and
you wouldn’t let her have a grape
well i still think that it’s a stupid reason not to call someone again
and if you need to just get an extra plate of fries for the table
maybe a plate of onion rings
you know we should just go i’m not gonna find anything here
rach come on i’m not gonna wear any of this
and nothing with padlocks on it
ross look i know that some of this stuff is out there but i mean come on look at this look at this sweater
i mean this is just beautiful
yeah down from seven hundred you are saving like two hundred bucks
both logic and math are taking a serious hit today
actually this looks like pretty good
all right that’s it i’m getting out of here
here’s a nice shirt look at these nice pants
uh actually these might look pretty good on me
you know what you should do
just go take a walk all right
i know your size and i’m
i’m gonna pick up some really good stuff for you
and i know what looks sexy on guys
please just wear what i suggest and she’s gonna go nuts for you
so you’re saying uh if i wear these pants i might be getting into hers
why do men keep talking to me like this
so the fact that i am a doctor and my wife’s a reverend that’s important to you
yeah i read some great applications but then i thought “who better then a minister to raise a child
plus i thought the baby would be in good hands with a doctor
does the bible say anything about adoption
and behold she did adopt onto them a baby
i was wondering you both have such serious jobs
would you have time to take care of a baby and your flock
oh you know my flock is good i mean yeah my flock pretty much takes care of themselves at this point
being a doctor must take up a lot of time
no ot for me it doesn’t
so how’s everything going in here
we’re great i think i may have asked all my questions
do you have any question for erica
so you read a file that you liked and you gave the agency the serial number and they contacted us
yes our system assures total anonimity
you’re really on top of stuff
well then if there’s nothing else then the two of us should talk
actually i don’t think we have to
yeah when i read about you two i was pretty sure i wanted you but i just thought we should meet face to face
oh my god this is great
you are so going to heaven
we got some really great stuff
yeah yeah but i am not sure about some of the bras i got
do you wanna try some of them on for me
wait are we in joeys imagination
i took one of ross bags bymistake and one of mine is missing
oh well ross probably has it you can get it from him later
i think were not wearing the same shirt anymore
rachel picked it out for me
she told me to trust her and you know what
i turned quite a few heads on my way over here
dude i really do not think you should be wearing that
oh i see somebody is afraid of a little competition with the ladies
looks like someone is the ladies
you are just jealous because you could not pull this off
yeah now if you will excuse me i have a date
we are not signing those papers
they think we are somebody else
she likes doctor chandler and reverend monica
well if you think about it i am kind of like a reverend
i mean as a chef i serve god by feeing the hungry and poor
cmon chandler i think we have been given an opportunity
i mean the mistake has already been made
they are writing up the paper right now
but we are not the one she chose
how can you feel okay about this
we may not be who she thinks we are but no one will ever love that baby more than us
i mean who knows how long it is gonna take for someone else to give us a baby
what if what if no one ever picks us
monica i want a baby too but this woman is giving away her child
she deserves to know who it is going to
so we will tell the truth and who knows maybe she will like us for us
why could not i have been a reverend
a garden salad for the lady
seafood platter for the gentleman and extra fries
oh i did not know you liked french fries
oh wow are those stuffed clams
yes they are my stuffed clams
how about those fries though huh
you are beautiful you know that
what is the matter with you
i do not like it when people take food off of my plate okay
but you just said what is mine is yours
well i did not mean it
fine sorry i did not think it was that big a deal
okay it is just when it comes to food i have certain rules okay i mean there are things you do
and so glad we are finally doing this
i really am sorry about you know
i just want to make sure you know that i really do like you
sure just not as much as clams
chocolate torte for the lady cheesecake for the gentleman
uh excuse me sir there seems to be some sort of red crap on my cheesecake
so stupid ordering cheesecake trying tobe healthy
oh all right just have what she is having instead
oh sorry sir that was our last piece
i thought you do not share food
if i cannot have your clams you cannot have my dessert
this is a two way street
now this all better be here when i come back
so these are the preliminary forms for an open adoption
there is a lot to go over but explain everything as we go through it
it is a sonogram they took of the baby last week
i thought you might want to see it
the agency must have made some mistake
my wife is not a reverend and not a doctor
i could perform an operation on you and prove it if you had like
well our names really are monica and chandler
yeah but the important thing to know about us is how much we would care for this little baby
so you lied to me before
see i could be a reverend
but we were hoping that since we told you the truth that you still might consider
you think give you my child after this
well you do not have to decide right now but if you could just look at our file
i do not want to look at your file
you have every reason to be upset
but only because we have been waiting and trying to have a baby for so long
now we do not know how long it is gonna be before we can get another chance again
why do not you ask the reverend to pray on it
ask them to see our file
my wifes a chef and in advertising
but it does not matter because what you did was wrong
she is loving and devoted and caring
and do not tell her i said this but the womans always right
i love my wife more than anything in this world
it kills me that i cannot give her a baby
and when that day finally comes learn how to be a good dad
turns out this sweater is made for a woman
so why are you still wearing it
hey so how was your date
well looks like it is just the two of us tonight huh old buddy
we could do a lot worse
